text: 'in aladhin la ysddiqwn bialhayat alakhirat min kafaar alearab wala yaemalun laha lysmmun almalayikat tasmiat al'inath; laetqadhm jhla 'ana almalayikat 'inath, wa'anahum banat allh. wama lahum bdhlk min eilm sahih ysddiq ma qalwh, ma yatabieun 'iilaa alzana aldhy la yjdy shyyana, wala yaqum abdana maqam alhq
